div.p: Ski PHP 2014 has announced the schedule for their upcoming conference, which will be on January 17-18, 2014 in Salt Lake City, Utah, USA. Our schedule is anchored by keynotes from Jared Smith, Laura Thomson, and Chris Hartjes, and also includes talks from Julien Pauli, Ed Finkler, John Coggeshall, Elizabeth Naramore, and many more.
Our Early Bird registration rate of just $129 is available until October 15th. Hotel group rate information is available at our site.
